ygData.subject: Re: CORFLUNK QUEST
ygData.msgSnippet: SOL (shock of lightning) does 78 at lvl 12 and maxs out at 82pts around level 15 I think.  Remember SOL is mana efficient.  60 mana for 78dmg is good.  The
ygData.messageBody:
SOL (shock of lightning) does 78 at lvl 12 and maxs out at 82pts around
level 15 I think. Remember SOL is mana efficient. 60 mana for 78dmg is
good. The other classes cannot hit as hard at your level. Clerics can hit
that hard at level 14 with ward undead but only against undead. Dont be
disappointed. You can take down an equal level or yellow MOB in 4 casts,
maybe 5 if one doesn't hit for full amount. Not bad...actually damn nice.

Ziffnab of Xegony
16th Wizard

-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Rolnicki [mailto:the_legion__@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 10:24 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: CORFLUNK QUEST


From: "Eric Rolnicki" <the_legion__@...>




how much damage does your shock of lightning deal? mine only deals 78
here...i'm kinda disappointed....i heard it should do 100+...dunno why
i'm 30 pts off....
-Rathanos
